meanings.definition: Not perturbed or agitated; calm and composed.
meanings.sent1: She remained unperturbed during the storm, showing her calm demeanor.
meanings.sent2: The unperturbed lake reflected the clear blue sky perfectly.
meanings.sent3: Even with all the chaos around him, he stayed unperturbed and focused on his task.
meanings.sent4: Her unperturbed attitude in the face of adversity was truly admirable.
meanings.sent5: The unperturbed cat lazily stretched out in the sun, unaffected by the noise.

meanings.definition: Not affected by disturbance or turmoil; undisturbed.
meanings.sent1: The old tree stood unperturbed by the strong winds that blew through the forest.
meanings.sent2: The unperturbed snow on the mountaintop sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The unperturbed baby slept soundly through the loud thunderstorm outside.
meanings.sent4: His mind was an unperturbed ocean, calm on the surface despite the chaos within.
meanings.sent5: The unperturbed garden was a peaceful oasis amidst the bustling city.
